Comrade [i](At the beginning of your combat, you may pair this with another unpaired creature you control until end of combat. Both attack this combat if able. Paired creatures gain the following abilities.)[/i]
Lifelink

Whenever you create a token, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. This ability triggers only once each turn.
{2}{W}: This creature gains agile until end of turn. [i](It deals combat damage first as long as it's attacking.)[/i]

When this creature enters, look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card with effigy or a Plains card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
Whenever this creature attacks, if it's paired with an attacking creature, tap target creature defending player controls.

Effigy {W} [i](If you cast this for its effigy cost, it isn't a creature until you pay its mana cost as a sorcery.)[/i]
Whenever you attack, creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

When this creature enters, behold Armageddon. [i](If you don't control a Fated War token, create one defended by an opponent. Otherwise, deal 2 damage to it.)[/i]
This creature gets +1/+1 for each other creature you control.

Comrade [i](At the beginning of your combat, you may pair this with another unpaired creature you control until end of combat. Both attack this combat if able. Paired creatures gain the following abilities.)[/i]
Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, return target creature card with mana value less than this creature from your graveyard to your hand.
Whenever an enchantment you control enters and whenever an enchantment with effigy you control becomes a creature, create a 1/1 colorless Spirit creature token with flying.

Flying
When this creature enters, create three 1/1 black Wraith creature tokens with “This creature can't block.”
Whenever this creature attacks, it gets +3/+0 until end of turn if you control three or more attacking tokens.

Effigy {2}{W} [i](If you cast this for its effigy cost, it isn't a creature until you pay its mana cost as a sorcery.)[/i]
Flying, lifelink
At the beginning of your end step, if you gained 3 or more life this turn, create a 3/3 white Angel creature token with flying.

cards.rules_text: Exile target enchantment or creature. Its controller creates a 2/2 colorless Knight creature token.

cards.rules_text: Destroy target creature if it's tapped or if it has power 4 or greater.

Flash
Enchant creature
When this enchantment enters, draw a card.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 and has flying.

When this enchantment enters, behold Armageddon. [i](If you don't control a Fated War token, create one defended by an opponent. Otherwise, deal 2 damage to it.)[/i]
Whenever you create a Fated War token or an ability of a Fated War battle you control triggers, create a 2/2 colorless Knight creature token.

Flying
When this creature enters, forebode. [i](Create a tapped colorless Omen artifact token with “{T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]

Vigilance
When this creature enters, forebode. [i](Create a tapped colorless Omen artifact token with “{T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]
Whenever you discard a card, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.
{1}{U}, {T}: Target opponent mills a card for each creature you control with toughness 4 or greater.

Whenever one or more cards leave your graveyard, surveil 2. This ability triggers only once each turn. [i](To surveil 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)[/i]

This spell costs {1} less to cast if you control an artifact and {1} less to cast if you control an enchantment.
Flying

When this creature enters, forebode. [i](Create a tapped colorless Omen artifact token with “{T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]
{T}: Until end of turn, target noncreature artifact or enchantment becomes a 4/4 Spirit creature in addition to its other types. Activate only as a sorcery.

Flying
When this creature enters, target instant or sorcery card with mana value 3 or less in your graveyard gains flashback {0} until end of turn. [i](You may cast that card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)[/i]

Effigy {2}{U} [i](If you cast this for its effigy cost, it isn't a creature until you pay its mana cost as a sorcery.)[/i]
Whenever an enchantment you control enters and whenever an enchantment with effigy you control becomes a creature, choose target creature an opponent controls. If it's tapped, put a stun counter on it. Otherwise, tap it. [i](If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.)[/i]

Effigy {3}{U} [i](If you cast this for its effigy cost, it isn't a creature until you pay its mana cost as a sorcery.)[/i]
Whenever one or more creatures attack you, those creatures get -1/-0 until end of turn.
Counter target creature spell. Its controller creates a 1/1 colorless Spirit creature token with flying.

Return up to two target creatures to their owners' hands. Forebode twice. [i](To forebode, create a tapped colorless Omen artifact token with “{T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]

Exile target creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.
Flashback {1}{U} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)[/i]

Draw two cards.
Flashback—{1}{U}, Sacrifice a permanent. [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)[/i]

When this enchantment enters, if you control a creature with toughness 4 or greater, draw a card.
Creatures you control have vigilance.
Whenever a creature you control with toughness 4 or greater enters, draw a card.

This creature can't block.
{B}, Sacrifice an Omen: Return this creature from your graveyard to the battlefield.

When this creature enters, behold Armageddon. [i](If you don't control a Fated War token, create one defended by an opponent. Otherwise, deal 2 damage to it.)[/i]
{1}{B}, Pay 2 life: Put a +1/+1 counter and a shadow counter on this creature. Activate only once. [i](A creature with shadow can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)[/i]
Flying, lifelink, deathtouch

When this creature enters, forebode. [i](Create a tapped colorless Omen artifact token with “{T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]
Whenever you sacrifice a nonland permanent, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

Deathtouch
When this creature enters, search your library for a card and put that card into your graveyard, then shuffle.

When this creature enters, behold Armageddon. [i](If you don't control a Fated War token, create one defended by an opponent. Otherwise, deal 2 damage to it.)[/i]
At the beginning of your end step, if a nontoken creature died this turn, you may pay {1}{B}. If you do, create a 2/2 colorless Knight creature token.
When this creature enters, mill two cards. When you do, target creature an opponent controls gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of card types among cards in your graveyard.

Effigy {2}{B} [i](If you cast this for its effigy cost, it isn't a creature until you pay its mana cost as a sorcery.)[/i]
At the beginning of your end step, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
Destroy target creature or enchantment. You lose 2 life.

Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. Forebode. You lose 1 life. [i](To forebode, create a tapped colorless Omen artifact token with “{T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]
Creatures target player controls get -1/-1 until end of turn. Behold Armageddon. [i](If you don't control a Fated War token, create one defended by an opponent. Otherwise, deal 2 damage to it.)[/i]

Return target creature card with mana value 4 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Flashback—{1}{B}, Pay 4 life. [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)[/i]

Target player discards two cards unless they discard a nonland card.
Flashback {1}{B} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)[/i]

Effigy {3}{B} [i](If you cast this for its effigy cost, it isn't a creature until you pay its mana cost as a sorcery.)[/i]
Flying
Whenever a card leaves your graveyard, this enchantment deals 2 damage to any target and you gain 2 life. This ability triggers only once each turn.
This creature gets +1/+1 if you control an artifact and +1/+1 if you control an enchantment.

Rend in Twain deals 2 damage to target creature. It deals 6 damage instead if you control an artifact and an enchantment.

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has menace.
Whenever enchanted creature deals combat damage to a player, forebode. [i](Create a tapped colorless Omen artifact token with “{T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]

{T}: Mill a card.
{6}{G}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice this creature: Create two 3/3 green Beast creature tokens. This ability costs {1} less to activate for each card type among cards in your graveyard. Activate only as a sorcery.
Whenever you attack, this creature gains indestructible until end of turn if you control an attacking creature with toughness 4 or greater.

{T}: Add {G}.
{4}{G}: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a permanent card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
[i]Landfall[/i] — Whenever a land enters under your control, forebode. [i](Create a tapped colorless Omen artifact token with “{T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]

Whenever you draw your second card each turn, put two +1/+1 counters on target land you control. You may have that land become a 0/0 Elemental creature in addition to its other types. If you do, it gains haste until your next turn.
When this creature enters, you may search your library for a creature card with toughness 4 or greater, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

cards.flavor_text: [i]As Ozhka's legion bore down on Vhalor, Ing'Wei's past and future intertwined. In that moment, she felt confidence, fear, and in a way, peace; all her enemies saw was deep blue.[/i]
